title: Social Media Assistant
description: As a Social Media Assistant, you will work closely with the social media manager or marketing team to execute social media strategies and campaigns. You will be responsible for assisting in the creation and scheduling of engaging content, monitoring social media channels, and interacting with followers.
responsibilities: Community engagement
Focus on social media content development and publication
Marketing and strategy support
Staying on top of trends and suggesting content ideas
Engaging with online communities
idealCandidate: Young (18-24 year old) Female social media manager
Passionate & Reliable: Having genuine interest, a strong desire to make a positive impact, being responsible, and committed to volunteer work

Adaptable, Team Player & Strong Communication Skills: Able to work effectively in diverse teams, contribute positively, be flexible, open to new challenges, and possess clear verbal/written communication, active listening, and constructive feedback
Respectful: Embracing diversity, being inclusive, treating others with respect, and abiding by rules and regulations
whenWhere: The onboarding event for this event will take place in Jan 18th, 2023 in AAU Auditorium.

title: Volunteer Teacher
description: Join our mission to provide quality education to underprivileged children. You will teach basic subjects and help create a positive learning environment.
responsibilities: Teach basic subjects (Math, English, Science)
Create lesson plans and educational materials
Monitor student progress and provide feedback
Maintain classroom discipline and safety
Participate in school events and activities
idealCandidate: Education background or teaching experience preferred
Patient and compassionate with children
Strong communication and organizational skills
Commitment to educational excellence
Ability to work in outdoor/community settings
whenWhere: Classes will be held at our community center in Addis Ababa.

title: Social Media Assistant
description: Help us tell the story of Africa through social media. You will create engaging content that showcases African culture, innovation, and opportunities.
responsibilities: Create and curate engaging social media content
Develop content calendars and posting schedules
Engage with followers and respond to comments
Track social media metrics and performance
Collaborate with the creative team on campaigns
idealCandidate: Creative and passionate about African culture
Experience with social media platforms
Strong writing and visual communication skills
Knowledge of current social media trends
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
whenWhere: Work will be primarily remote with occasional in-person meetings in Addis Ababa.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Join our team to build modern, responsive web applications. You will collaborate with designers and backend developers to deliver high-quality products.
responsibilities: Develop responsive web applications using React/Next.js
Collaborate with UI/UX designers and backend developers
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Participate in code reviews and technical discussions
Optimize applications for performance and accessibility
idealCandidate: 2+ years of experience with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies
Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with responsive design and cross-browser compatibility
Knowledge of version control systems (Git)
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
whenWhere: This is a fully remote position with flexible working hours.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze large datasets to extract actionable insights for our clients. Experience with SQL and Python is required.
responsibilities: Collect, clean, and analyze large datasets
Create data visualizations and reports
Develop predictive models and statistical analyses
Present findings to stakeholders and clients
Maintain data quality and integrity standards
idealCandidate: Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field
Proficiency in SQL, Python, and data visualization tools
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Experience with statistical analysis and modeling
Excellent communication and presentation skills
whenWhere: Office-based position in Nairobi with some remote work flexibility.
